channel.title: [RS2006] Team of Programmers
channel.description:
Most of you probably already know that I'm trying to remake old RuneScape in the 2006 era ([url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,489018.0.html]project thread[/url]). This isn't a one-man job, we need several people working on this together. To be apart of the project, you MUST be encouraged and inspired to go all the way through with this. For some inspiration, click [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=13FCwDQu018]here[/url].
The amount of type of programmers I'm looking for:
[ul][li]2-4 server developers[/li] [li]1-2 client developers[/li] [li]1-2 web designers/developers (able to re-create the old RuneScape forum)[/li][/ul] If you want to get paid for your work, we can arrange something as I know a lot of the work will be hard and tedious, so I feel that you should deserve it.
If you think you're up for it, please leave a reply and why you should join the team. Also, leave your Skype or MSN.
Thanks, Vault.
